title: Murexsul aradasii
text:
Murexsul aradasii is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a marine <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Muricidae">Muricidae</a>, the murex snails or rock snails.
Description.
The shell size varies between 7 mm and 18 mm
Distribution.
This species is distributed in European waters along <a href="Madeira">Madeira</a> and the <a href="Canary%20Islands">Canary Islands</a> and in the Mediterranean Sea along <a href="Greece">Greece</a>.
